titles.title: Miwaleta Park Expansion Act
To provide for the conveyance of certain Bureau of Land Management lands in Douglas County, Oregon, containing a county park and certain adjacent lands to the county government.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.

bill.summary: 9/25/1998--Introduced. Milwaleta Park Expansion Act - Directs the Secretary of the Interior to convey to the county of Douglas, Oregon, without consideration, Milwaleta Park and an adjacent parcel of Bureau of Land Management lands for use as a county park.
